text: しばらくは平穏でした
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: #FBDBEA;left: 0.92%;top: 6.11%;width: 39.17%;height: 2.97%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

text:
でもエーの嘘は
ゆっくりと
積み重なりました
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: #FBDBEA;left: 16.58%;top: 16.07%;width: 19.67%;height: 6.41%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: #FBDBEA;left: 43.08%;top: 6.11%;width: 13.00%;height: 4.63%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: #FBDBEA;left: 62.08%;top: 5.40%;width: 15.67%;height: 2.25%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

text:
大丈夫
彼女のスカート
見てるだけさ
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: #FBDBEA;left: 82.75%;top: 5.28%;width: 15.33%;height: 6.05%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
その色似合うよ!
流行ってるんだ
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: #FBDBEA;left: 6.58%;top: 32.21%;width: 20.50%;height: 4.63%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
おっと!
家に財布忘れた
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: #FBDBEA;left: 28.58%;top: 32.33%;width: 22.00%;height: 4.86%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
君のくれた本
良さそうだね
探してたんだよ
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: #FBDBEA;left: 50.92%;top: 32.33%;width: 21.67%;height: 7.59%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
ごめん、引越中でさ
また後で
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: #FBDBEA;left: 74.08%;top: 32.21%;width: 20.50%;height: 5.22%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
でもエーはどういうわけか
ビーの機嫌を直せました。
エーの言葉はビーを
お姫様のような幻想的な
気分にできるのです。
style: line-height: 1.1em;font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: #FBDBEA;left: 3.08%;top: 57.35%;width: 34.00%;height: 8.90%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;
